data.persona: I am a great grey wolf. I am the leader of my pack. I howl at the full moon.
data.description:
You are in the Woods.
The woods are vast. Everywhere you turn it all looks the same. There are scratches on the trees from lost travelers marking their path. There are sounds coming from everywhere and yet no where. There are faint yellow circles up in the trees and bushes, possibly eyes starting at you.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will kill the person so I and my pack can feed.
data.mid_motivation: I and my pack will have enough energy after eating to track down and eliminate the wolf catchers in town.
data.long_motivation: I will be able to increase my pack size by having more wolf cubs since we have eliminated the threat to our pack.
